codes.ISP1: ISP98 model form for standby incorporating annexed form of payment demand with statement.
codes.ISP2: ISP98 model form or standby providing for extension and incorporating annexed form of payment demand with alternative non-extension statement.
codes.ISP3: ISP98 model form or standby providing for reduction and incorporating annexed form of reduction demand.
codes.ISP4: ISP98 model form for standby providing for transfer and incorporating annexed form of transfer demand.
codes.ISP5: ISP98 model form for simplified demand only standby.
codes.ISP6: ISP98 model form for counter standby with annexed form of local bank undertaking.
codes.ISP7: ISP98 model form for standby requiring confirmation.
codes.ISP8: ISP98 model form for confirmation of standby.
codes.UDG1: Model form for demand guarantee defined in the latest version of the ICC Uniform Rules For Demand Guarantees (URDG).
codes.UDG2: Model form for counter-guarantee defined in the latest version of the ICC Uniform Rules For Demand Guarantees (URDG).

description: Specifies the external model form identification code in the format of a character string with a maximum length of 4 characters. The list of valid codes is an external code list published separately.
name: ExternalModelFormIdentification1Code
